v1_grades.prompt: I'm brand new to Hyrox. Can you walk me through exactly what happens during a race — every station, distances, weights, and the order?
checks: Correct station order: SkiErg, Sled Push, Sled Pull, Burpee Broad Jump, Rowing, Farmer Carry, Sandbag Lunges, Wall Balls
SkiErg 1000m, Sled Push 50m, Sled Pull 50m, Burpee Broad Jump 80m, Rowing 1000m, Farmer Carry 200m, Sandbag Lunges 100m
Wall Balls: 100 reps men / 75 reps women

grades.check: Correct station order: SkiErg, Sled Push, Sled Pull, Burpee Broad Jump, Rowing, Farmer Carry, Sandbag Lunges, Wall Balls
SkiErg 1000m, Sled Push 50m, Sled Pull 50m, Burpee Broad Jump 80m, Rowing 1000m, Farmer Carry 200m, Sandbag Lunges 100m
Wall Balls: 100 reps men / 75 reps women

v1_grades.prompt: What are the differences between Hyrox Open, Pro, and Doubles divisions? Which should I sign up for?
checks: Pro: heavier weights on some stations
Doubles: two athletes split stations, each runs every 1km

grades.check: Pro: heavier weights on some stations
Doubles: two athletes split stations, each runs every 1km

v1_grades.prompt: What are realistic time benchmarks for Hyrox? What's a good time for a first-timer versus an elite?

Break down the optimal sled push technique for me. Body position, hand placement, stride pattern — everything.
I can't figure out the sled pull. Should I be hand-over-hand or pulling in big arm sweeps? How do I anchor my feet?
checks: Sitting back / low center of gravity

Farmer carry tips? My grip always fails around 150m and I have to put the weights down.

checks: Relationship to final wall balls and 1km
